title: Why do i need to reinstall the entire game when a patch or update comes out?
body: Alright, I'm on a limited internet plan over the holidays due to my grandparents not having a reliable internet provider due to them living in the county, I downloaded the patch which alone is a concern, but then I go to click play, and all I see is ''DOWLOADING GAME'' and the size is around 2300mbs and the eta is 132 minutes, wtf man that download is about 1/5 of the allotted monthly plan, now I cant play due to the massive download size.

replies.body:
Unless your data plan has limitations to bandwidth, this could be caused by other settings or even wifi impacting strength.  If you're on wifi, you'll want to run a wired connection to help.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can also help clear up any snags to our patching service.

Update:  It looks like patching is showing some outrages patch file sized.  Our network team is looking into it now per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.

i think its not the internet...I have the same problem and ive never had problems with internet... The game (In control panel under programs tab) shows up as 135MB big... But when i go to the game files (Via file explorer) and open properties it shows up as 7.36GB big...{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Heya, yeah looks like there's an issue with patch sizes.  I think it may be a visual error while the patcher gets game files ready for updating.  Updates are being provided now on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.

But the thing is, I did install the patch which was only 142mbs or so, but when I attempted to log in after wards it replaced the play/lobby button with a ""scanning files"" and went through about 2-40 of then then automatically jumped to a ""downloading game"" and I noticed a sudden spike in wifi internet usage, this wouldn't be a problem if I was at home on my Ethernet, but since there's a 12gb hotspot to share between 3 people, it's very hard, today was the last day of this ""plans cycle"" and if we go over all of have unlimited 2g which is some lousy ass download speed, but I hope it's manageable

Heh sorry for these long ass strings of posts, but when I did let the ""downloading game"" part of it go for a while the number randomly dropped from around 2300mb to 1600 mb in a very quick 2 minutes, even though my download speed was listed as 250kBps, and I didn't record a large ass amount of data being used despite the Leagueclientux which was mainly me longing in (it had to load all those pictures and videos which as we know videos use a f**k ton of data)

Sorry not sure why it posted my comment above yours even though I quoted it, but in regards to my laptops usage which I reset last night, the game itself uses about 20mb per gaming session but the Leagueclientux uses about 320mb just idling after the patch, the limitation to my internet isn't a huge problem for just gaming, it's the patches that murder the allotment, I can use discord and play about 6 ranked games worth of six seige and it ends up using about 100-250 mbs in total, and the only main game using the data is CSGO. Thank you in advance for these issues I hope you can get to the bottom to, but since I'm pretty sure today's the end of the cycle I'll go through the pain of 40kBps of 2g speeds so I can at least play when the high speed part comes back, I'm looking forwards to seeing how Zoe plays, and if it isn't a problem to ask, will the blue eccense be easier to obtain at one point? Grinding levels out is hard when pit against some high elo players that I occasionally see
